en: [Entries from the Cherokee Supreme Court Docket, 1823-1834, New Echota] 1828 Nov. 6

This is an excerpt from the Cherokee Supreme Court docket for the years 1823 to 1834. The Cherokee Supreme Court convened annually in New Echota beginning on the second Monday in October and lasting three weeks. This is an excerpt from Thursday November 6, 1828, on which dated a case involving debt was heard before the court. Entries from this Supreme Court docket cover items ch100-ch163.

body.value: Thuresday Thursday 6th Nov. November 1828 The Court according to adjournment. Present The Judges A. Ross . J. Huss and W. S. Adair . Thomas Pettit & David Vann vs John Downing Executor of George Downing decd. deceased On a plea of Debt, arising from Copartership Copartnership in trade amounting to $4271.00 The Court finds for the Defendant Witnesses attendance Mary Alberty 5 days at hickory Log $3.75 at New Echota __ 7 days 5.25 Salley Allberty ___ 7 " 5.25 Stephen Whitmire 15 " 11.25 Thomas Saunders 15 11.25 Wind ___ 15 11.25 James Doherty 15 11.25 Nelly Downing 15 11.25 â€• $70.50 deturo? to Eli Harlin Execution issued 13th Decr December _
